distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for json-c fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-12762: Fixed integer overflow and out-of-bounds write. (bsc#1171479)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: json-c through 0.14 has an integer overflow and out-of-bounds write via a large JSON file, as demonstrated by printbuf_memappend.
notes.title: CVE description
